attributes.action: To Curb futher influx of Non EU petitioning members/States
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under current review of the EU petition membership to give further reconsideration of Bulgaria and Romania from flooding the already over populated United Kingdom and the  possibilty of mass unemployment, over stretched NHS facilities and local government housing crisis.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
